lead_data.Title: Chief Technology Officer
lead_data.Description: We are expanding our manufacturing facilities and need industrial network infrastructure. Budget approved for Q2 2024. Looking for switches, cables, and network management solutions.

lead_data.Title: Director of IT
lead_data.Description: We are evaluating network solutions for our office expansion.

case_data.Subject: Hirschmann Switch Keeps Restarting
case_data.Description: Our Hirschmann industrial switch has been restarting every 2-3 hours for the past week. This is affecting our production line. The switch is model RS20-0800T1T1SDAEHC. This is urgent.

case_data.Subject: Fiber Optic Cable Defective
case_data.Description: The fiber optic cable we purchased last month is not working correctly. The connector seems loose and we're experiencing signal loss. Product SKU: FO-1234-50M.

case_data.Subject: Cannot Access Customer Portal
case_data.Description: I cannot log into the customer portal. My password doesn't work and the password reset link is not being sent to my email.

case_data.Subject: Product Information Request
case_data.Description: I would like to know more about your industrial switches. What models do you have available? What are the specifications?
